nodes.bodyText: I don't really think this is necessary.  You get the whole new group correctly set with all expected attributes.
Actually, it is. Because a lot of code expects the given object to be modified. Without it, a lot of code would have to be rewritten.
Ok so please just comment it.

Regarding this, don't we want to then return group object instead of the newGroup ?
And just a note, it would be so nice to use Postgres INSERT .... RETURNING query, but its not supported by HSQLDB which we use for the tests.
There is missing the change for RichGroup.
It is not needed in rich group because it is reusing the method for creating a group where it is present.
Setting of UUID is missing in constructor.
